title: Beyond the Horror: Cult Episode 3
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: (I'm sorry I'm commenting so much hahaha) I think the reason they haven't been quick with making it an obvious cult or saying the word 'cult' out loud is because they're trying to maybe play into the idea that it takes time to get into somebody's head so much that they'll abandon their morals/families/ideals and put their faith in a group or person. It doesn't happen overnight so I think that's why it's a slow burn
And I actually dont think Meadow is dead since this is the first time someone has disappeared instead of just being killed
I think Harrison and the detective are in a kind of relationship - and he's the "friend" that Meadow mentions to Kai
Milo Yiannopoulos is another example of what Mary is talking about at13:00
Ivy is the mom that's become pretty clear and my theory is the psychiatrist guy is the leader of the cult n he uses pples fears against them that's also become kind of obvious
description:
VIDEO CONTAINS SPOILERS FOR American Horror Story, Season 7, Episode 3!!!

Beyond the Horror: Cult, is an unofficial American Horror Story Live After Show. Hosted by MaryGirl Moody. Guests include: Maisie Andrews, Casey Soper, and Tami Sifford. We discuss and review each episode of American Horror Story Cult.
